Articles.Content:
Well no.

no , can't even do anything in c++

False.

The user below me owns a lot of indie games

Depends on what "alot" is. i guess we can say i've got ~10. I guess that's around 15% of my games so it's abit at the least.

The user below me is from Europe

No I am a american.

False, but maybe 2 decades later I would.

well no since my fear heights is pretty serious.

False

well no but fez are cool

well technically time is passing so... yes

false, its in all lowercase

no,. just no

only when whe charicters speak anything other than english

false never been on one

false I don't even know what that is
